channel.title: Seercull
channel.description: Okay so I added seercull made it where it has the bow stuff and its able to shoot dragon arrows but whenever I attack a monster it hits it like its a sword but arrows come out how do I get the bow to shoot as regular bows do

item.title: Seercull
item.dc:creator: @jackfrost890 jackfrost890
item.description:
@jackfrost890 wrote:

Well it didnt work cause it slashes like an item i hate this seercull lol

Read full topic

item.title: Seercull
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I’m going to make an assumption that you’re working with a 317 PI. Make sure from now on, when you post help threads, you are more specific about your source and revision.

In your CombatAssistant class, there’s an int called getWepAnim(String weaponName). You should be able to figure it out from there.

Read full topic
